ray.rage.asset.mesh

Class MeshManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.asset.AbstractAssetManager<Mesh>
      • ray.rage.asset.mesh.MeshManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssetManager<Mesh>, Disposable

    public final class MeshManager
extends AbstractAssetManager<Mesh>
    A mesh manager is an asset-manager responsible for managing the life-cycle of meshes.

    A mesh manager owns the meshes it creates and is responsible for making sure that the same mesh is not loaded more than once. In the event that a client requests a pre-existing mesh, this manager will return the pre-existing instance.

    This allows meshes to serve as the basis for multiple objects in the world, each represented by an entity.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
    See Also:
    Mesh, MeshLoader, Entity
